resources.string: A powerful,that is widely used for system and application software
resources.string-array:
A powerful, general-purpose programming language that is widely used for system and application software.
A high-level, interpreted language known for its readability and simplicity\
Structured Query Language is used for managing and manipulating relational databases
A versatile, object-oriented programming language that is used for building cross-platform applications
HyperText Markup Language is the standard language for creating web pages.
Cascading Style Sheets describe the presentation of a document written in HTML or XML.
A dynamic, high-level scripting language that enables interactive web pages.
